briefing.text:
Sword's demo in 9 use cases

This demo shows the main features of Sword OT v3.1. The terrain is the 9 times duplication of the same terrain (near Angers).

Thus, each case is an improvment of the previous one and allow a smooth increase in the demo complexity.

Profiles

  • Free demo: freely use this scenario
  • Scripted demo: a script will interactively drives you towards the scenario with recorded orders and contextual information

Objectives

  • Introduction to Sword's main features
